mapper.select: select s.* from (select a.addressId,vipName,addressee,addresseePhone,addresseeName,defaultAddress, concat(a1.areaName,'-->',a2.areaName,'-->',a3.areaName) areaName from t_address a left join t_area a1 on a.sheng=a1.id left join t_area a2 on a.shi=a2.id left join t_area a3 on a.xian=a3.id ) s

select s.* from (select a.addressId,vipName,addressee,addresseePhone,addresseeName,defaultAddress, concat(a1.areaName,'-->',a2.areaName,'-->',a3.areaName) areaName from t_address a left join t_area a1 on a.sheng=a1.id left join t_area a2 on a.shi=a2.id left join t_area a3 on a.xian=a3.id ) s where s.addressId=#{addressId}
